Warehouse Keeper Collob: Welcome, my young friend! We, the Iron Gate Guild, provide maximum security for your stored items at a minimal cost to you. Simple, straightforward and safe -- and there are no hidden fees for recovering your items like some other guilds charge. Now, how can I help you?
